1370: Hildebrandus moved to Die lange straet3.E.11 after marriage.
Got married to Eingeliadis at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Pietersen, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Eingeliadis, Diddekin, at age 21.
1372: Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Cecilia, at age 22.
1373: Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Lisebette, at age 23.
Lost daughter Lisebette when Lisebette was 1 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Linnea, at age 24.
1375: Had a son with Eingeliadis, Ase, at age 25.
1376: Lost daughter Victoria when Victoria was 0 years old.
Eingeliadis gave birth to their stillborn daughter Victoria in 1376.
1377: Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Walburgis, at age 27.
1379: Had a son with Eingeliadis, Betten, at age 29.
1380: Had a son with Eingeliadis, Vais, at age 30.
Lost son Vais when Vais was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1388: Lost son Ase when Ase was 14 years old.
1390: Lost daughter Pietersen when Pietersen was 21 years old.
